info.name: YNAB Dark blue
info.description: A Dark blue theme for the You need a budget website.
info.additionalInfo:
Only the newest browser versions supporting CSS variables will work, currently (160312) this means having at least Chrome 49, Firefox 42 or Safari 9.1

You are also free to do with this as you please

Issues: Lacking support for goal/pacing bars with Toolkit for YNAB, not anything i can do.


Releases:


160317: minor issues fixed.
160312: Initial release.
